name: Funky Frogs
description:
These groovy frogs are ready to heat up the dance floor, but will the crowd of crazy clubbers let them?

In Funky Frogs you and a friend have to complete dancing combos while avoiding the ever changing mass of other dances that constantly expands and pressures you.

Fill up the star bar and become king of the dance floor! :)

Team:D

Dev: Elsio Perazzini

Dev and GD : Rodrigo Forti

Animations and GD: JG Guimaraes

Art: Camila Queiroz
